> **Derivative of:** SCP-2721 by DolphinSlugchugger and kinchtheknifeblade
[[/<]]
-----

Another thing for pride month! I've been wanting to do this article for a while now and the stars finally aligned.

I like this article a lot. It's nice. I think it's the quintessential "weird but real" article that I genuinely really think is the core of SCP content. Idk. I just feel like when people write about their experiences through the lense of an anomaly it just makes writing feel more whole. 

 I'm probably going in for surgery next Tuesday so this is gonna be the last one of these for a while, I'm afraid (Ofc it's pride month that gets cut short lmfao) but if you're doing art fight I'm gonna be doing that next month and I'd love to have more people to attack!

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
